channel.title: Xbox 360 hacks and mods
channel.description:
Share you hacks and mod tutorials or just tell us what you got and what you want.
[b]Modern Warfare 2;[/b] Hacks: Had aimbot. Got all camos except uzi and attatchments (camos were legit) Mods: Modded controller, gamertag and classes
Btw does anyone have a jtag? And what is a flashed xbox?
ADD ME "SUMMERWINE1"

item.title: Xbox 360 hacks and mods
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:16, topic:347865”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=444247.msg3262847#msg3262847 date=1278635263]

and i used to have a jtag… it broke o.O i could pay 2 dollars for it to work again for like 5 minutes, but cbf

yeah, don’t lie.

You could easily make 100$ off donations, so your saying 2 bucks isn’t worth 100?
[/quote]your an idiot. i have well over 2 dollars… i just cant be fucked to send it in for 5 minutes of working time…

you wouldn’t want 5 minutes of your time to fix a jtag? I would use 1 hour of my time. maybe more[/quote]it only is 10th prestige + all emblems/titles… no wall hacks or nothing. i want the others legit…

Read full topic

item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:13, topic:347865”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=444247.msg3262431#msg3262431 date=1278607074]
I’ll make a note to the flashed xbox’s.
Not sure if someone made a patch for this yet, but all Flashed Xbox’s get your gamertag’s banned, and your xbox banned. You basically can’t play online.

[/quote]
The xbox doesn’t get you banned, it’s the games. And your gamertag isn’t banned, just the xbox… Ask Tico :p[/quote]Then thats what happened to my friend lol; poor kid. he dont even play on xbox.

item.title: Xbox 360 hacks and mods
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:5, topic:347865”][quote author=m.dog311 link=topic=444247.msg3262160#msg3262160 date=1278570094]

Share you hacks and mod tutorials or just tell us what you got and what you want.

Modern Warfare 2;
Hacks: Had aimbot. Got all camos except uzi and attatchments (camos were legit)
Mods: Modded controller, gamertag and classes

Btw does anyone have a jtag? And what is a flashed xbox?

ADD ME “SUMMERWINE1”

Yes I have a jtag, and a flashed xbox is an xbox that has the disk drive “flashed” so that it can play games you download and burn to DVDs.

I have all the jtag mods (allow you to basically do anything on any game), I have a gamertag mod, I did the gamerscore mod (lol 400,000GS :p), and I’m getting a Viking 360 modded controller. I also hotswap my COD WAW disk, which allows me to play modded nazi zombies & host 10th prestige games on there.
[/quote]
Hook a brother up with a wallhack [size=2pt]lol i cant speak nigger[/size]

btw where you get your jtag?[/quote]Lmao, it sounds nigger enough.
I believe flashed xbox’s cannot play online? or is it just something else that my mate has.

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox 360 hacks and mods
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

casey.:

jtags are easy to get off craigslist or ebay.

Well ive found a few on trademe.co.nz but im not to sure if they’re what im looking for.

The ultimate Xbox 360 hack has finally arrived! We are now using the latest XBR and FreeBoot software.We have installed the latest modded dashboard which supports USB.

Now you can enjoy the exciting world of Xbox 360 homebrew software, which is already blazing hard and gathering momentum, with almost daily releases and updates of very useful software. You can easily host modded 10th Prestige Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 lobbies.

This will allow you to use homebrew applications, such is NXE2GOD which enables users to backup games to HDD and play without the CD. This is for backups only, do not abuse your rights, but it is capable to copy any game.

This package includes:

  1. Jtaged Xbox 360 console
  2. NXE2God on a cd
  3. XeXmenu on cd
  4. Readme tutorial on how to install applications and play downloaded/hdd installed games.

This auction is only for the modded xbox 360 console, no av cables, HDD or powerpack included.

Happy Bidding!

Don’t buy from traders with bad feedback, please note our 100% feedback!

NOTE: The Xbox did have Red Ring of Death (RRoD) but it has been professionally repaired by removing the X-clamps and replacing them with quality washers. New thermal paste has also been applied.

Offline Tenth Prestige lobby’s work for online XBL accounts, our site is back up and we will offer free fix of RROD within a 3 month warranty period prior to purchase.

This mod was professionally done by www.****.co.nz

Im looking for a jtagged xbox thats able to give me aimbots and wallhacks.

Read full topic

Btw does anyone have a jtag? And what is a flashed xbox?

ADD ME “SUMMERWINE1”
[/quote]
Yes I have a jtag, and a flashed xbox is an xbox that has the disk drive “flashed” so that it can play games you download and burn to DVDs.

I have all the jtag mods (allow you to basically do anything on any game), I have a gamertag mod, I did the gamerscore mod (lol 400,000GS :p), and I’m getting a Viking 360 modded controller. I also hotswap my COD WAW disk, which allows me to play modded nazi zombies & host 10th prestige games on there.[/quote]

ADD ME “SUMMERWINE1”[/quote]
Yes I have a jtag, and a flashed xbox is an xbox that has the disk drive “flashed” so that it can play games you download and burn to DVDs.

I have all the jtag mods (allow you to basically do anything on any game), I have a gamertag mod, I did the gamerscore mod (lol 400,000GS :p), and I’m getting a Viking 360 modded controller. I also hotswap my COD WAW disk, which allows me to play modded nazi zombies & host 10th prestige games on there.
